com.github.davidmoten.security

Class PPK

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.davidmoten.security.PPK

  • @NotThreadSafe
public final class PPK
extends Object
    Stands for Public Private Key. Might also have been called PKC (Public Key Cryptography).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PPK.Builder

      static PPK.Builder privateKey(byte[] bytes)
      Returns a PPK builder having read the private key from the given byte array.
      static PPK.Builder privateKey(Class<?> cls, String resource)
      Returns a builder having loaded the private key from the classpath relative to the classloader used by cls.
